author: skitching
msg: Alter implementations of orchestra-provided servlet filters. This makes the following incompatible changes:
1. Class frameworkAdapter/FrameworkAdapterServletFilter no longer exists. It is replaced by
2. Class conversation.jsf.OrchestraServletFilter no longer has a servlet config param to choose the framework; it
always chooses jsf (as the package name indicates).
There are some other API changes, but nothing that is likely to affect users.

msg: First step to fix COCOON-2138: Support protocols provided by the JDK for sitemap locations.

author: vsiveton
msg: MJAVADOC-149: Newline in ${project.organization.name} makes javadoc fail

o Patch adds also quotes for packagesheader parameter
